jd: From: Roshan singh yadav, Tek Inspirations roshan.yadav@tekinspirations.com Reply to: roshan.yadav@tekinspirations.com Hi,Hope you are doing well.Have a look at role. Let me know your view. JOB TITLE: Senior Oracle DeveloperJOB LOCATION: please submit local candidate to role only Walpole MAvisa: ONLY USC AND GC moi: skype Required Experience8-10 years of experience with Oracle EBS, particularly with versions 11.5 and above.Technical Proficiency: Strong skills in SQL, PL/SQL, Power BIProblem-Solving: Strong analytical skills to solve complex technical problems.Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills.Preferred Qualifications Team Environment: Experience working in a multi-developer team environment.Job Description Develop and Customize: Create, modify, and maintain Oracle EBS components, including forms, reports, and workflows.Technical Support: Provide technical support for Oracle EBS modules, particularly in areas like Financials, OPM.Integration: Develop and maintain application interfaces, ensuring seamless integration across different modules.Troubleshooting: Identify and resolve issues, ensuring system efficiency and reliability. Desired Skills and ExperiencePL/SQL, PL /SQL, PL SQL, ORACLE EBS, E-BUSINESS SUITE, E-BUSINESS, ORACLE APPLICATIONS, ORACLE APPLICATION, ORACLE EBS APPLICATIONS, ORACLE FINANCIALS E-BUSINESS Regards, Roshan Singh YadavTechnical RecruiterTEK Inspirations LLC | 13573 Tabasco Cat Trail, Frisco, TX 75035.Email: - roshan.yadav@tekinspirations.com
